title: Game playback on Todays Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A user enters the app via a deeplink into iOS with 'tv' as the host

EX: 


https://www.mlb.com/tv/g775307/v8b9bdc81-7312-41f7-9dc8-3e722205fa46#game=775307
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The deep link content is found in Forge
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is routed into the Games EPG page before launching the video player

AND

+ Playback is successful if entitled to watch MLB.tv 

AND

+ User must link their account if attempting to launch a postseason game that requires cable authorization

title: Non-game video item playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A user enters the app via a deeplink into iOS with 'video' as the host

EX: 

https://dapi.cms.mlbinfra.com/v2/content/en-us/videos/the-story-of-billy-bean (SVOD)

https://dapi.cms.mlbinfra.com/v2/content/en-us/videos/curtain-call-aaron-judge-hits-two-home-runs-x5088 (VOD)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The deep link content is found in Forge
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is routed into the video player

AND

+ Playback is successful if entitled to subscriber content such as SLive and SVOD

OR

+ Playback is not successful if the user is not entitled

OR

+ A preroll ad begins prior to VOD playback if the user is not entitled

title: Non-game video item playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A user enters the app via a deeplink into iOS with 'video' as the host

EX: 

https://dapi.cms.mlbinfra.com/v2/content/en-us/videos/mlbn-live-stream
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The deep link content is found in Forge
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is routed into the video player

AND

+ Playback is successful if entitled to MLB Network content
